extendedInfo.description: Now your Android phone can remind you of all your vehicle maintenance. With the Monro Mobile App you can:â¢	Track your vehicle maintenance schedules.â¢	Search and record your repair history.â¢	Receive notifications of when services are due. â¢	Located your closest or favorite Monro store. â¢	Make appointments quick and easy. â¢	Search for tires.â¢	View and use promotional coupons.Monro Muffler Monro Muffler Brake & Service Auto Repair Auto Maintenance Vehicle Repair Oil Change Tire Search Tire Sale Brake inspection state fuel belt timing manufacturer muffler ignition

reviews.title: I can find a store and see promos, not much more
reviews.comment: Things that work: setting a \"home store\", store locator, creating a user account, inputting extremely basic info for my car.  I haven\'t used \"search tires\" or \"make appointment\" yet.  \"OEM recommended\" under \"My Vehicles\" kind of works--I can see what the OEM recommends on a generic \"this model\" basis, but the app should let me select one of my existing vehicles already entered, and find it that way.  Instead I have to enter all the vehicle info on that screen again, and do the search.  Possibly if I had more than one car in my \"database\" this would work properly.    Things that don\'t work:   My Vehicles - repair history.  I am allowed to make a search, but all I get is \"New exciting service coming soon!\"  I don\'t know if this affects \"service reminders\" as possibly \"service reminders\" is just a list of things I should do for my car at certain mileages.  A repair history from monro would be a great feature if it worked.
reviews.author: Julie Ankrom

reviews.title: Won\'t let me schedule
reviews.comment: I got suckered into trying this app because their flyer said I would get 50% off an oil change. Well, the app won\'t let me schedule, and the store refuses to give me the discount because they need a code generated by the app. Oh, and it takes several weeks to get the code according to the store. I\'m deleting this app and may take my business elsewhere because of this.
reviews.author: Merkur Man Paul

reviews.title: Sux
reviews.comment: No one ever calls to confirm appt, if u just show up they don\'t take u. Bridgeport, Ohio
reviews.author: Allison Beck

reviews.title: Not working correctly
reviews.comment: Will not let me put a year in for my dodge ram truck pretty much useless

reviews.title: Vehicle Information Wrong
reviews.comment: Model years for Chrysler Town & Country limited to 1988 - 1991??? STILL can not specify any other year OR manually enter correct year!  Great idea but lots of bugs to get worked out.

reviews.title: Bad for appointments but good for coupons
reviews.comment: I love my local Monroe store, but it is the corporate store who NEVER let the local store know when I make an appointment through this app. Nice app to get a coupon which the local store always honors.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Did anyone else get my email instead?
reviews.comment: I tried to reset my password multiple times. Despite the messages noting that a new password has been sent to my email, the emails never came. I figure after ten time, I decided 1/2 off the oil change is not worth the hassle of dealing with this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can\'t update any vehicle information.  Keeps telling me to fix repair history because of conflicts.  Repair history is empty.  Nothing to fix.  Worthless app until this is resolved.

reviews.title: Asus Tablets
reviews.comment: Works on Asus Transformer (TF-101), but graphics are distorted and cannot access app settings.  The 50%  discount oil change has one or two surprises in the fine print (like a 9.9% surcharge on top of the disposal fee)...
